alert.note: Alert for Northwestern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 14 at 2:16PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Lander and north central Nye Counties through 245 PM PDT... At 216 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles southwest of Kingston, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Lander and north central Nye Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northwestern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
